Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1979...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1979, off Gene Garber (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1979, off John Henry Johnson (PHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 4/23/1981...
Injured on 10/2/1981 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1982, hitting .481 with 1 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1984, hitting .577 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1984...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 4/15/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1985, hitting .621 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Traded from Los Angeles to Cleveland on 5/19/1985 (Going to LA: 2B R. Gant. Going to CLE: 1B H. Ochiai)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (A) on 4/20/1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/24/1987...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1987, hitting .386 with 2 HR, 22 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 8/12/1988...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Baltimore on 8/28/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1988, hitting .609 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won MVP Award in 1988, hitting .372 with 20 HR, 93 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1988...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/28/1989, off Bill Landrum (TEX)...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1989...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/31/1990...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (A) on 6/14/1990...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1990...
Traded from Cleveland to Texas on 1/31/1992 (Going to TEX: 1B H. Ochiai. Going to CLE: P F. Youmans)...
Released by Texas on 1/31/1993...
